articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Oyondi's Portfolio
articles.description: This site highlights top projects i have completed in the past, the ones i am working on and my future plans of projects to undertake.
articles.contents:
Portfolio Goal Setting
Main Goal
To create an interactive website to keep a record of my projects, showcase my previous projects, current ones, and future projects.
Rationale
Having worked in the technology industry for a long time, I understand the significance of showing potential employers your previous skills and what you can do. In my current job, my interviewers wanted to know the kind of work I have been doing before, and the only way I was able to show was to share my GitHub link which was a little difficult to navigate. I will create a website that is linked with my various GitHub projects whereby I will write summaries of the projects and include visualizations through markdown.
Plan
Identify all the projects I have worked on this course and sort them based on the most successful or well-organized project.
Publish the projects in my GitHub account.
Create a website using R markdown and find a suitable template available in GitHub pages.
Extract links for all my major projects from GitHub.
Connect each project to my portfolio.
I plan to keep on updating it with new projects.
Type of portfolio
An interactive website built with R markdown.
